name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

name: Aegis Turtle
flavor_text:
"The endurance of the ancient turtles in a land so harsh makes a strong case for patience, tranquility, and composure."
—Gavi, nest warden

name: Aerial Assault
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavor_text:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

name: Aether Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Release that which was never caged."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Aggressive Urge
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

name: Agonizing Syphon
oracle_text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

name: Alloy Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

name: Ambassador Oak
oracle_text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

name: Ancestral Statue
oracle_text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.

name: Angelic Edict
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

name: Angelic Page
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Angel of Mercy
oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

name: Arbor Armament
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Llanowar's boughs are ever ready
To unleash an autumn of steel leaves."
—"Song of Freyalise"

name: Archaeomender
oracle_text: When Archaeomender enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Just as a broken relic can be mended, a shattered history can be made whole."

name: Ashmouth Hound
oracle_text: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

name: Auger Spree
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Bake into a Pie
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

name: Bathe in Dragonfire
oracle_text: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.

name: Battlefield Promotion
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."

name: Befuddle
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still.

name: Black Cat
oracle_text: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.
flavor_text: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.

name: Blighted Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}: Blighted Bat gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Amonkhet's dual suns don't allow for the darkness of night, so bats are most active under the gloom of the frequent sandstorms.

name: Blindblast
oracle_text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Bloodhunter Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

name: Bloodrock Cyclops
oracle_text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"There are only fifty words in the cyclops language, and ten of them mean 'kill.'"
—Ertai

name: Boggart Brute
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ."
—Gisa the Mad

name: Borderland Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

name: Borderland Minotaur
flavor_text:
"You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back. The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow. "I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory."
—*The Theriad*

name: Bulwark Giant
oracle_text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text:
"Where did *she* come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Burglar Rat
oracle_text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

name: Cadaver Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

name: Cathar's Companion
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels

name: Cauldron Familiar
oracle_text:
When Cauldron Familiar enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sacrifice a Food: Return Cauldron Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.

name: Cemetery Recruitment
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.
flavor_text: "There's a smoothness to my magic here that I don't find on any other plane."

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: No guilds—that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

name: Chromatic Sphere
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher

name: Cloudreader Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Cloudshift
oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
"Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit

name: Collateral Damage
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Collateral Damage deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: It is much easier to create fire than to contain it.

name: Commune with Dinosaurs
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Corpse Hauler
oracle_text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."
—Shelac, necromancer

name: Crookclaw Transmuter
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Crow of Dark Tidings
oracle_text:
Flying
When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Well, this can't be a good sign."
—Old Rutstein

name: Crushing Canopy
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety."
—Shaper Tuvasa

name: Dawntreader Elk
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Dawntreader Elk: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Silent as winter snow, it seeks wild places unspoiled by the walking dead.

name: Death's Approach
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?"
—Strava, Dimir mage

name: Divine Arrow
oracle_text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.

name: Douse in Gloom
oracle_text: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The Mardu warrior was overjoyed when Tasigur set him free and granted him passage through the jungle. He failed to notice the Sultai leader's cruel smile.

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.

name: Dragon Hatchling
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Drainpipe Vermin
oracle_text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.
flavor_text: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

name: Dutiful Attendant
oracle_text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.

name: Elemental Uprising
oracle_text: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. It must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text:
"My heart and Zendikar's beat as one. Together we will endure."
—Nissa Revane

name: Erratic Visionary
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Eternal Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Fa'adiyah Seer
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.
flavor_text: "My visions don't show me home. They show me where home is yet to be found."

name: Fanatical Firebrand
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Feral Invocation
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

name: Feral Prowler
oracle_text: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

name: Fertilid
oracle_text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

name: Festering Newt
oracle_text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
flavor_text: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

name: Flame Lash
oracle_text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "This is just my warm-up."

name: Fling
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: Never flinch. Never falter. Never fear.

name: Flurry of Horns
oracle_text: Create two 2/3 red Minotaur creature tokens with haste.
flavor_text: A minotaur does not distinguish between human, satyr, and triton. They are all meat.

name: Forced Worship
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{2}{W}: Return Forced Worship to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Imprisonment teaches revenge. Hobbling teaches resignation.

name: Forge Devil
oracle_text: When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: A bit of pain never hurts.

name: Fortify
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Funeral Rites
oracle_text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then mill two cards.
flavor_text: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.

name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

name: Ghoulraiser
oracle_text: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Gingerbrute
oracle_text:
Haste
{1}: Gingerbrute can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The unlabeled vial was not vanilla extract after all.

name: Goblin Instigator
oracle_text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavor_text: "We can take 'em. You go first!"

name: Goblin Shortcutter
oracle_text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."

name: Grave Bramble
oracle_text: Defender, protection from Zombies
flavor_text: Nature abhors a zombie.

name: Healer's Hawk
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

name: Heartfire
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

name: Hungry Flames
oracle_text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

name: Indomitable Will
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
"Charge bravely. Fight selflessly. Act honorably. Iroas will watch over you."
—Verenis, priest of Iroas

name: Initiate's Companion
oracle_text: Whenever Initiate's Companion deals combat damage to a player, untap target creature or land.
flavor_text:
"I'd like to say that it's our pet, but the reverse may be closer to the truth."
—Ixor, initiate of Rhet crop

name: Innocent Blood
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We are armed with light and steel. Who can stand against us?"

name: Inspiring Captain
oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Time to show the foe our true mettle."

name: Ironshell Beetle
oracle_text: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Please don't feed the beetles."
—Promenade warning sign

name: Jousting Dummy
oracle_text: {3}: Jousting Dummy gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't let it fool you. Many of us got our first scars from Syr Nobody."
—Syr Layne, knight of Embereth

name: Kalastria Nightwatch
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, Kalastria Nightwatch gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Kiln Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Kitesail Corsair
oracle_text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Knightly Valor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Knight of the Tusk
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

name: Launch Party
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

name: Lawless Broker
oracle_text: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

name: Lawmage's Binding
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

name: Leaf Gilder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

name: Leave in the Dust
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The daredevil racers of the Derby Crows, long at odds with the Consulate, were quick to join the renegades in open revolt.

name: Lightning-Core Excavator
oracle_text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Lightning-Core Excavator: It deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"That's the third time this month it's exploded on site. Maybe we should switch to something a little less defective."
—Kerrin, archaeologist

name: Lightning Diadem
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Lightning Diadem enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: "I fight for Keranos and for mortals. I see no contradiction."

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"Oh, it's easy enough to kill, but I'm not going anywhere near it."
—Norin the Wary

name: Lightning Shrieker
oracle_text:
Flying, trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, Lightning Shrieker's owner shuffles it into their library.
flavor_text: Dragonslayers learned to keep silent about their deeds after seeing the terrible vengeance wrought by Kolaghan and her brood.

name: Lightning Visionary
oracle_text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "The gods don't speak to mortals with gentle entreaties. They speak with thunder and fury."

name: Lightwalker
oracle_text: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

name: Mana Geode
oracle_text:
When Mana Geode enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it."
—Saheeli Rai

name: Marauder's Axe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: A sharp axe solves most problems.

name: Mark of the Vampire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

name: Mesa Unicorn
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: The unicorns of Sursi are a manifestation of Serra's joy and compassion. They frolic and dance like children, offering blessings to anyone they encounter.

name: Miasmic Mummy
oracle_text: When Miasmic Mummy enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
flavor_text: Its breath doesn't assault the senses. It pollutes the mind.

name: Minotaur Skullcleaver
oracle_text:
Haste
When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Their only dreams are of full stomachs."
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Minotaur Sureshot
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{R}: Minotaur Sureshot gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Those wings are no advantage. I will pin them to the ceiling of the Hekma."

name: Molten Ravager
oracle_text: {R}: Molten Ravager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Only the foolhardy would venture into the Akoum Mountains without a lullmage to tame the raging rocks and living fires."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Moment of Heroism
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Mugging
oracle_text: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

name: Murmuring Phantasm
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text:
"The most insidious thing in the world is nonsense that sounds just plausible enough to listen to."
—Lazav

name: Myr Sire
oracle_text: When Myr Sire dies, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token.
flavor_text: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

name: Narcolepsy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.
flavor_text:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: New Horizons
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Nightshade Stinger
oracle_text:
Flying
Nightshade Stinger can't block.
flavor_text:
"Most faeries are harmless pranksters. Every now and again, though, you get one that crosses over from mischievous to malicious."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Nocturnal Feeder
oracle_text:
Flying
When Nocturnal Feeder dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: A living pulse is an irresistible temptation.

name: Octoprophet
oracle_text: When Octoprophet enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: In every swirl of the tide, it sees the awakening of things yet to come.

name: Orazca Frillback
flavor_text: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.

name: Ornery Goblin
oracle_text: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

name: Outnumber
oracle_text: Outnumber deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text: Everyone who could still lift a weapon had a part in retaking Sea Gate.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Can't a fella get a moment's peace around here?"

name: Parasitic Implant
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature's controller sacrifices it and you create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token.

name: Peel from Reality
oracle_text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

name: Penumbra Bobcat
oracle_text: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.
flavor_text: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

name: Perilous Myr
oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

name: Phyrexian Broodlings
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
flavor_text: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

name: Phyrexian Debaser
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Pillar of Flame
oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion.

name: Pirate's Cutlass
oracle_text:
When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Plagued Rusalka
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."
—Savra

name: Pouncing Cheetah
oracle_text: Flash
flavor_text: Rhonas's monument is home to a wider variety of creatures than anywhere else in the city of Naktamun—a feature most initiates fail to appreciate.

name: Prescient Chimera
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Presence of Gond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
flavor_text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: Prosperous Pirates
oracle_text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

name: Raise the Alarm
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

name: Rishadan Airship
oracle_text:
Flying
Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.

name: Ronom Unicorn
oracle_text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Roving Keep
oracle_text:
Defender
{7}: Roving Keep gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. It can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text:
"It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Rumbling Baloth
flavor_text: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

name: Runed Servitor
oracle_text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Sage's Row Savant
oracle_text: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.
flavor_text: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.

name: Sailor of Means
oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Sanitarium Skeleton
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

name: Sarkhan's Rage
oracle_text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

name: Scroll of Avacyn
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Scroll of Avacyn: Draw a card. If you control an Angel, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: Words to bless the eye that reads them, telling of a future beyond the reach of fear.

name: Scrounging Bandar
oracle_text:
Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.
flavor_text: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: Sea Gate Oracle
oracle_text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "The secret entrance should be near."

name: Selhoff Occultist
oracle_text: Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player mills a card.
flavor_text: "The mist whispers to those who know it to be more than a mundane fog."

name: Shambling Goblin
oracle_text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle."
—Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

name: Signpost Scarecrow
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all."
—Corliss the Wanderer

name: Skittering Surveyor
oracle_text: When Skittering Surveyor enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Like a cross between a spider and a spyglass, but friendlier.

name: Slate Street Ruffian
oracle_text: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Merciless to the point of psychosis. Let's give him a job."
—Zelinas, Orzhov recruiter

name: Soul Salvage
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Sporemound
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Storm Sculptor
oracle_text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.

name: Sweep Away
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If that creature is attacking, you may put it on top of its owner's library instead.
flavor_text: The Roil takes many forms. It also takes many victims.

name: Sylvan Brushstrider
oracle_text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.

name: Sylvan Ranger
oracle_text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Take Heart
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.
flavor_text: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

name: Tandem Tactics
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"The land has its own intentions, beyond the understanding of those who live on it."
—Nissa Revane

name: Terrarion
oracle_text:
Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Thermo-Alchemist
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
flavor_text: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

name: Thought Collapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.
flavor_text:
"I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full."
—Lazav

name: Thought Scour
oracle_text:
Target player mills two cards.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"As you inject the *viscus vitae* into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Thriving Bluff
oracle_text:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

name: Thriving Grove
oracle_text:
Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

name: Thriving Heath
oracle_text:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

name: Thriving Isle
oracle_text:
Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

name: Thriving Moor
oracle_text:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
flavor_text: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

name: Time to Feed
oracle_text: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Tithebearer Giant
oracle_text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa

name: Torch Fiend
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

name: Towering-Wave Mystic
oracle_text: Whenever Towering-Wave Mystic deals damage, target player mills that many cards.
flavor_text: Thassa's favor followed him to the Underworld. Even the waves of Nerono obeyed his will.

name: Trusty Retriever
oracle_text:
When Trusty Retriever enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Trusty Retriever.
• Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Wipe away the slobber and it's as good as new, give or take a few bite marks.

name: Vampire Neonate
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

name: Vastwood Zendikon
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Vedalken Entrancer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: Their denial reaches far into your future.

name: Voice of the Provinces
oracle_text:
Flying
When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

name: Voyage's End
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

name: Wailing Ghoul
oracle_text: When Wailing Ghoul enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, sweet brother. Help is on the way."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: Wall of Vines
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Waterknot
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Wight of Precinct Six
oracle_text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.
flavor_text: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Winged Words
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.

name: Wishful Merfolk
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.
flavor_text: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.
